speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Arlene McCarthy ( A6-0226/2007 ), on behalf of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on specific problems in the transposition and implementation of public procurement legislation and its relation to the Lisbon Agenda ( 2006/2084(INI) .
original: President. The next item is the report by Arlene McCarthy ( A6-0226/2007 ), on behalf of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection, on specific problems in the transposition and implementation of public procurement legislation and its relation to the Lisbon Agenda ( 2006/2084(INI) .
agenda_item: The transposition and implementation of public procurement legislation (debate)
